name: Tehra Dark Warrior & DynoGems
description:
Two mini games on your PSP® system or your PlayStation®3 system at the best price. Play DynoGems, an incredibly addictive and easy game to play. Get ready to enjoy the new gem from the classics "Match Three" or take your adrenaline to the limit with "Tehra Dark Warrior", a fast-paced 3D action-adventure game that will immerse you in a fantasy land where you will fight against orcs, wizards, huge trolls, and strange beasts.

Players: 1
Memory Stick Duo™ Compatible: 128 KB

One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
